    js-lint:
      run: npx eslint --fix {staged_files} && git add {staged_files}
      glob: '*.{js,ts}'
    ping:
      run: echo pong
    ruby-lint:
      run: bundle exec rubocop --force-exclusion --parallel '{files}'
      glob: '*.rb'
      files: git diff-tree -r --name-only --diff-filter=CDMR HEAD origin/master
    ruby-test:
      run: bundle exec rspec
      skip:

  parallel: true
